articles.title: 'I didn't know when he'd lose his temper': Chantalle Ng says dad Huang Yiliang once caned her so badly she was hospitalised for a week - AsiaOne

articles.title: Carpark ward? Tan Tock Seng Hospital sheds light on viral video showing beds in makeshift area - AsiaOne
